_header: After our song our mirth and our gladness
_description: Couplet closing to three roundels addressed by Hoccleve to money (6204, 2034, 4193), introducing next piece (4879)

HunHM744.Transcription:
Aftir our song our mirthe & our gladnesseHeer folwith a lessoun
                    of heuynesse
HunHM744.Facsimiles:
Burrow,  John,  and  A. I. Doyle, eds.  
             Thomas Hoccleve: A Facsimile of the Autograph Verse
                Manuscripts.
EETS
         s.s. 19 (2002).
